name: Chop Suey
storyline: Two little girls explore the small town of Cortland, Ohio.
summary: Chop Suey is a point-and-click adventure game intended for girls aged 7–12, featuring a colorful interactive storybook. The player clicks on the map of the town to explore buildings, houses and roads. Whenever everything in an area has been examined, the cursor changes to a moon, and a pointing finger appears on the screen to lead to another location.
